mil7.5.5:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.5:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṃ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṃ;
mil7.5.5:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṃ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṃ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṃ anulimpitabbaṃ.
mil7.5.5:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
